fieldUpdates.name: CAB - Approval State to Approved Prod
CAB - Approval State to Approved UAT
CAB - Change ownership for Major Type
CAB - Change ownership for Standard Type
CAB - Set Status to In Progress

fieldUpdates.description: Clear the Case Age
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Clear Case Age (B/H)

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the New Customer Attachment field
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Clear New Customer Attachment

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the New Customer Email field
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Clear New Customer Email

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the New Portal Case Comment field
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Clear New Portal Case Comment
CASE: Clear Quote Second Reminder Date

fieldUpdates.description: Calculates the final followup due date depending on the case Priority. Urgent & Critical are Today + 2 and High & Medium are Today + 3.
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( TEXT(Priority) = 'Urgent' || TEXT(Priority) = 'Critical', CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, NOW()+3, 1, NOW()+2, 2, NOW()+2, 3, NOW()+2, 4, NOW()+4, 5, NOW()+4, 6, NOW()+4, NOW() ), CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, NOW()+4, 1, NOW()+3, 2, NOW()+3, 3, NOW()+5, 4, NOW()+5, 5, NOW()+5, 6, NOW()+5, NOW() ))
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Final Followup Due

fieldUpdates.description: Calculates the first followup due date depending on the case Priority. Urgent & Critical are Today + 2 and High & Medium are Today + 3.
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( TEXT(Priority) = 'Urgent' || TEXT(Priority) = 'Critical', CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, NOW()+3, 1, NOW()+2, 2, NOW()+2, 3, NOW()+2, 4, NOW()+4, 5, NOW()+4, 6, NOW()+4, NOW() ), CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, NOW()+4, 1, NOW()+3, 2, NOW()+3, 3, NOW()+5, 4, NOW()+5, 5, NOW()+5, 6, NOW()+5, NOW() ))
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: First Followup Due
CASE: Quote Expiry T+30 Work Days
CASE: Quote First Reminder T+5 Work Days

fieldUpdates.description: Calculates the second followup due date depending on the case Priority. Urgent & Critical are Today + 2 and High & Medium are Today + 3.
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( TEXT(Priority) = 'Urgent' || TEXT(Priority) = 'Critical', CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, NOW()+3, 1, NOW()+2, 2, NOW()+2, 3, NOW()+2, 4, NOW()+4, 5, NOW()+4, 6, NOW()+4, NOW() ), CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, NOW()+4, 1, NOW()+3, 2, NOW()+3, 3, NOW()+5, 4, NOW()+5, 5, NOW()+5, 6, NOW()+5, NOW() ))
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Second Followup Due
CASE: Second Reminder T+10 Work Days

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the date & time of the last customer contact
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Set Last Customer Contact
CASE: Set Status to Pending Quote

fieldUpdates.description: This field is updated when the status is changed to Resolved
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Update Status Change Data

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the AwaitInfoFinalFollowupDue date on the Case
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Clear Final Followup Due Date

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the AwaitInfoFirstFollowupDue date on the Case
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Clear First Followup Due Date

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the AwaitInfoSecondFollowupDue date on the Case
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Clear Second Followup Due Date

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Case field AwaitInfoFinalFollowupDue date as 6 work days from today
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Final Followup T + 6 work days

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Case field AwaitInfoFinalFollowupDue date as 9 work days from today
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Final Followup T + 9 work days

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Case field AwaitInfoFirstFollowupDue date as 2 work days from today
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: First Followup T + 2 work days

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Case field AwaitInfoFirstFollowupDue date as 3 work days from today
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: First Followup T + 3 work days

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Case field AwaitInfoSecondFollowupDue date as 4 work days from today
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Second Followup T + 4 work days

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Case field AwaitInfoSecondFollowupDue date as 6 work days from today
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Second Followup T + 6 work days
Case: Set Quote Status to Lapsed

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the Resolved Date when the Case Status is changed to Resolved
fieldUpdates.name: CASE: Set Resolved Date

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the Resolved Date to Closed Date when necessary
fieldUpdates.name: Case: Set Resolved Date to Closed Date

fieldUpdates.description: Update Case Reason to allow close
fieldUpdates.name: Case Update Reason for Close

fieldUpdates.description: Set Resolution to allow close
fieldUpdates.formula: "Customer did not respond to requests for information"
fieldUpdates.name: Case Update Resolution for Close

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Final Resolution MS Warning to false
fieldUpdates.name: Final Resolution MS Warning False

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Final Resolution MS Warning to true
fieldUpdates.name: Final Resolution MS Warning True

fieldUpdates.description: Used to indicate that the First Response Milestone has been successfully completed.
fieldUpdates.name: First Response True

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Interim Resolution MS Warning to false
fieldUpdates.name: Interim Resolution MS Warning False

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Interim Resolution MS Warning to true
fieldUpdates.name: Interim Resolution MS Warning True

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Case Interim Solution Provided to true
fieldUpdates.name: Interim Solution Provided True

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Response MS Warning to False
fieldUpdates.name: Response MS Warning False

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Response Milestone Warning to True
fieldUpdates.name: Response MS Warning True

fieldUpdates.description: Set DevAnalysisTrue checkbox to false if the "Developer Analysis" field on the case is cleared
fieldUpdates.name: SetDevAnalysisFalse

fieldUpdates.description: Set DevAnalysisTrue to True
fieldUpdates.name: SetDevAnalysisTrue

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the Case Stopped field to true
fieldUpdates.name: Set Stopped True

fieldUpdates.description: Sets the Stopped checkbox on case to false
fieldUpdates.name: Set Stopped False

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Update MS Warning to false
fieldUpdates.name: Update MS Warning False

fieldUpdates.description: Sets Update MS Warning to true
fieldUpdates.name: Update MS Warning True
Update Status = In Progress when Take Ow

rules.description: Processes the calculations for the quote reminders
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Quote Approval') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Clear the Awaiting Internal Area field when they case is changed from In Progress to Awaiting Customer, Resolved, Closed, With Customer or Scheduled.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Status) && ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'In Progress') && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'With Customer') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Scheduled') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Clear Awaiting Internal Follow-up Date
rules.description: Clear Awaiting Internal Follow-up date when Awaiting Internal Area is set to None
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Awaiting_Internal_Area__c) && ISBLANK(TEXT(Awaiting_Internal_Area__c)) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Clear the calculated durations when the associated date is nullified
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( ClosedDate ) && ISNULL(ClosedDate) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Clears the Quote Status Date when Quote Status is cleared
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( Quote_Status__c ) && ISBLANK(TEXT(Quote_Status__c)) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Clear the calculated durations when the associated date is nullified
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Resolved_Date__c) && ISNULL(Resolved_Date__c) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Processes the reminder regarding engagement
rules.formula: ISBLANK( Engagement_Start_Date__c ) = False && ISBLANK( Engagement_Start_Reminder__c ) = False && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && TEXT( Status ) = 'Scheduled' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Closes the Case when the Quote has reached its Expiry date
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Quote Approval') && ISBLANK(Quote_Sent__c) = False && ISPICKVAL(Quote_Status__c, '') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && New_Customer_Email__c = False && ISBLANK(Quote_Expiry__c) = False && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Processes the reminder regarding Quote sent to customer when no response
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Quote Approval') && ISPICKVAL(Quote_Status__c, '') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && New_Customer_Email__c = False && ISBLANK(Quote_Reminder__c) = False && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send expiry email for quote, close case
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Quote Approval') && ISPICKVAL(Quote_Status__c, '') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && New_Customer_Email__c = False && ISBLANK(Quote_Expiry__c) = False && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send first reminder for quote after case has been set to 'Awaiting Quote Approval'
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Quote Approval') && ISPICKVAL(Quote_Status__c, '') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && New_Customer_Email__c = False && ISBLANK(Quote_Reminder__c) = False && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send second reminder for quote after case has been set to 'Awaiting Quote Approval'
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Quote Approval') && ISPICKVAL(Quote_Status__c, '') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && New_Customer_Email__c = False && ISBLANK( Quote_Second_Reminder__c) = False && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Set In Progress Engagement Start
rules.description: Sets Status to In Progress when Engagement starts
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Scheduled') && ISPICKVAL(Quote_Status__c, 'Accepted') && ISBLANK(Engagement_Start_Date__c) = False && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Set the Resolved Date when Case Status is set to Resolved
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Status) && ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Resolved') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Set Resolved Date on Close
rules.description: Set the Resolved Date when Case Status is Closed and Resolved not yet set
rules.formula: IsClosed && ISNULL(Resolved_Date__c) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Manages followup reminder emails when more information requested and customer has not obliged
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && (RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Waiting for Info Final Followup
rules.description: Processes the Final Followup for Request for further information from Customer
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && (ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'High') || ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Medium') || ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Urgent')) && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && ( RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue'|| RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT(ISBLANK(AwaitInfoFinalFollowupDue__c))

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Waiting for Info Final Followup v2
rules.description: Processes the Final Followup for Request for further information from Customer
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && ( RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue'|| RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT(ISBLANK(AwaitInfoFinalFollowupDue__c))

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Waiting for Info First Followup
rules.description: Processes the First Followup for Request for further information from Customer
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && (ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'High') || ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Medium') || ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Urgent')) && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && ( RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT(ISBLANK(AwaitInfoFirstFollowupDue__c))

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Waiting for Info First Followup v2
rules.description: Processes the First Followup for Request for further information from Customer
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && ( RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT(ISBLANK(AwaitInfoFirstFollowupDue__c))

rules.description: Manages followup reminder emails when more information requested and customer has not obliged
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'High') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && (RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Manages followup reminder emails when more information requested and customer has not obliged
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Medium') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && (RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Waiting for Info Second Followup
rules.description: Processes the Second Followup for Request for further information from Customer
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && (ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'High') || ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Medium') || ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Urgent')) && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && ( RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT(ISBLANK(AwaitInfoSecondFollowupDue__c))

rules.fullName: CASE%3A Waiting for Info Second Followup v2
rules.description: Processes the Second Followup for Request for further information from Customer
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && ( RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT(ISBLANK(AwaitInfoSecondFollowupDue__c))

rules.description: Manages followup reminder emails when more information requested and customer has not obliged
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Awaiting Customer') && ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Urgent') && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = False && (RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question' || RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue' || RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && New_Customer_Email__c = False && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: When a Change Request is changed to Applied PROD, notify the Contact (tester)
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Applied PROD")

rules.description: When a Change Request is changed to Applied UAT notify Contact (Tester)
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Applied UAT")

rules.description: When a Change Request is changed to Approved PROD notify the Case Owner (Admin)
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Approved PROD")

rules.description: When a Change Request is changed to Approved UAT, notify Case Owner (Admin)
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Approved UAT")

rules.description: When a Change Request is changed to Complete set Status to Closed
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "COMPLETE")

rules.description: When a Change Request is changed to Dev Completed notify Contact (Tester)
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Dev Completed")

rules.description: Notify the case owner of a Change Request the day before it's due to be implemented
rules.formula: RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && IsClosed = False && NOT(ISNULL(Implementation_Date_Time__c))

rules.fullName: CR Sales DEV to Pending UAT
rules.description: When a Sales Cloud Change Request is changed from DEV to Pending UAT notify the Sales Cloud Approvers Group
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Pending UAT") && ISPICKVAL(System__c, "Sales Cloud")

rules.description: When a Sales Cloud Change Request is changed to Pending PROD notify the Sales Cloud Approvers Group
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Pending PROD") && ISPICKVAL(System__c, "Sales Cloud")

rules.fullName: CR Service DEV to Pending UAT
rules.description: When a Service Cloud Change Request is changed from DEV to Pending UAT notify the Service Cloud Approvers Group
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Pending UAT") && ISPICKVAL(System__c, "Service Cloud")

rules.description: When a Service Cloud Change Request is changed to Pending PROD notify the Service Cloud Approvers Group
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ) && RecordType.Name = "Change Control" && ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Pending PROD") && ISPICKVAL(System__c, "Service Cloud")

rules.description: When a Salesforce Change Request is changed to Dev, case owner is notified
rules.formula: AND (ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ), RecordType.Name = "Change Control", ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "Dev"))

rules.description: When a Salesforce Change Request is changed to Rejected, Case Owner is notified and Status is changed back to Dev
rules.formula: AND (ISCHANGED( SFCAB_Status__c ), RecordType.Name = "Change Control", ISPICKVAL(SFCAB_Status__c, "REJECTED"))

rules.description: Generate an email to Contact when one of the Status equates to Case being Closed
rules.formula: IsClosed = True && RecordType.Name <> 'Change Control' && RecordType.Name <> 'I require Consulting services' && Resolution__c <> 'Customer did not respond to requests for information' && Resolution__c <> 'Quote expired' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: Case Close notify contact Cons Serv
rules.description: Generate an email to Contact when one of the Status equates to Case being Closed when record type is I require Consulting services
rules.formula: IsClosed = True && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && Resolution__c <> 'Quote expired' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Updates Case: Priority Has Changed flag when a customer changes the priority on an open Case.
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed = False, ISCHANGED(Priority), BEGINS(LOWER($Profile.Name), 'customer'), NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c) )

rules.fullName: Case Rec Type to Cons Serv
rules.description: Set status to Pending Quote when record type changed to I require Consulting Services.
rules.formula: IsClosed = False && ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ) && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c)

rules.description: Send an email to appropriate staff advising of Case given a Critical Priority
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Critical') && NOT( RecordType.Name = 'Change Control') && NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c)

rules.description: Set DevAnalysisTrue checkbox to False if the "Developer Analysis" field on the case is cleared
rules.formula: ISBLANK( Developer_Analysis__c ) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Set DevAnalysisTrue checkbox if the "Developer Analysis" field on the case has a value
rules.formula: NOT( ISBLANK( Developer_Analysis__c ) ) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send email to Contact when new Case is created
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') && (NOT(Account.QUEUE_Allocation__c = 'AMS') || (Account.QUEUE_Allocation__c = 'AMS' && RecordType.Name = 'I am experiencing an issue') || (Account.QUEUE_Allocation__c = 'AMS' && RecordType.Name = 'I have a Question') || (Account.QUEUE_Allocation__c = 'AMS' && RecordType.Name = 'I require a TechnologyOne Cloud service') ) && NOT(RecordType.Name = 'Change Control') && NOT(RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services') && NOT(RecordType.Name = 'Consulting - Question') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: Notify Contact On case creation - AMS
rules.description: Send email to Contact when new Case is created and routed to the AMS queues
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') && (Account.QUEUE_Allocation__c = 'AMS') && (RecordType.Name = 'I require an AMS service') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.fullName: Notify Contact On case creation - Consulting Services
rules.description: Send email to Contact when new Consulting Services Case is created
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') && RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services' && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send an email to appropriate staff advising when a Critical Case is closed
rules.formula: IsClosed = True && NOT( RecordType.Name = 'Change Control') && ISPICKVAL( Priority , 'Critical') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send an email to appropriate staff advising when Case Critical Priority downgraded
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Priority) && ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Priority) , "Critical") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Critical")) && NOT( RecordType.Name = 'Change Control') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send an email to appropriate staff advising when a Case is upgraded to Critical Priority
rules.formula: ISCHANGED(Priority) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Priority) , "Critical")) && ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Critical") && NOT( RecordType.Name = 'Change Control') && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Restarts the Case Milestones
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), OR (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status) , 'On Hold'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status) , 'Awaiting Customer')), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'In Progress'), NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c ))
ISCHANGED( Interim_Solution__c ) && NOT(ISBLANK(Interim_Solution__c )) && NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: Send email to Case Contact when Status is Resolved
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Resolved') && NOT(RecordType.Name = 'I require Consulting services') && NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c)

rules.description: Send an email to appropriate staff advising of Case raised by specific customers
rules.formula: Account.Id = '001G000001JbFx4' || Account.Id = '001G000001JbFhg' || Account.Id = '001G000001z8hlh' && NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c)

rules.description: Send an email to appropriate staff advising of Case updated for specific customers
rules.formula: (Account.Id = '001G000001JbFx4' || Account.Id = '001G000001JbFhg' || Account.Id = '001G000001z8hlh') && ((ISCHANGED(New_Customer_Attachment__c) && New_Customer_Attachment__c = true) || (ISCHANGED(New_Customer_Email__c) && New_Customer_Email__c = true) || (ISCHANGED(Priority_Has_Changed__c) && Priority_Has_Changed__c = true) || (ISCHANGED(New_Portal_Case_Comment__c) && New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = true)) && (Case_Age_in_Minutes__c > 3) && NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c)

rules.description: Stops the Case Milestones
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), OR (ISPICKVAL(Status , 'On Hold'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Awaiting Customer')), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'In Progress'), NOT( $Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c ))

rules.fullName: Update Chatter Answers to Question Record Type
rules.description: Sets specific Case field values for any Case added via Chatter Answers
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Chatter Answers') && NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c)

rules.fullName: Update Status %3D In Progress when Take Ownership
rules.description: Update Status to In Progress when the take ownership button is pressed
rules.formula: (ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") && LEFT(Owner:User.Id, 3) = '005' && Owner:User.ContactId = '' && NOT($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c))
